posts.post_content:
Huh, lets try to math this out. Your 1/1 attackers each get +4/+0 from the anthems. They have trample from the plow, and when they hit, they deal double, double, courtesy of anthems. That means, that when doubled twice, and the opponent has only an equivalent number of 1/1s to block, each one will be hitting opponent face for either 19 or 16 damage, depending on how doubling damage and trample works(i have no idea).   
for clarity:  
1/1->5/1 trample.(anthem)  
Assign 1 damage to blocker, 4 to opponent  
Double to 2 and 8  
double again to 4 and 16  
16 damage sticks. possibly. someone correct me on this, i am just running ideas around.
